Pre-Game Insights: South Africa are flying high after the 229-run thrashing they handed England.
South Africa have scored 300-plus every time they have batted first in this World Cup.
Bangladesh, on the other hand, are in the bottom half of the points table and are in dire need of stringing together some victories so that their journey doesn't come to an early end.
The South African batters, on the other hand, have been in roaring form, with telling contributions all through the batting order.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai is a balanced pitch.
Pacers have been very successful at this venue.
The team winning the toss may decide to bat or bowl depending on the ground conditions today.
There is no probability of rain.
Others: South Africa currently ranks third for most wickets taken by teams in the 2023 World Cup.
Bangladesh needs to pull a rabbit out of the hat today.
Bangladesh All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while Batters have earned the most fantasy points for South Africa.
This will be South Africa's first ODI clash against Bangladesh in Asia since 2015, when they lost a three-match series 1-2.
The Wankhede has been a favourite hunting ground for South Africa, who posted 438 against India back in 2015 before posting the highest total by any team in an ODI against England a few days back.
This will be Bangladesh's first match at the Wankhede Stadium since 1998 and also only their second game at this venue.
